text: This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and safeguard your data, taking into consideration the principles and requirements set forth in these regulations.
We maintain access logs for a defined retention period as required by applicable laws and regulations.

Some of the uses of the collected personal data included but not limited to: We may use anonymized and aggregated data for statistical purposes, market research, and to improve the App's performance and features
We retain all collected data only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this privacy policy, unless a longer retention period is required or permitted by law.
We may use cookies and other tracking technologies to collect information about your usage of the App and improve your experience.
Some of the uses of the collected personal data included but not limited to: Provide customer usage statistics to merchants

In such cases, we may collect and store this additional data to enable the functionality of these features.
When merchants install our app, they may have the option to upload videos, conduct Zoom meetings, and upload files through our app.
We only collect personal information that is necessary to provide and improve the functionality of our app.
